text:
The error seems to be located in URIResolver.getNode().
The URI given as imput is:
jar:file:/0/koala/shillion/xml-batik/batik-1.1/batik-svgbrowser.jar!/org/apache/batik/apps/svgbrowser/resources/init.svg#innerShadow
The one given to documentLoader.loadDocument() by a call to purl.toString() is:
jar:file:/0/koala/shillion/xml-batik/batik-1.1/batik-svgbrowser.jar!/org/apache/batik/apps/svgbrowser/resources/file:/0/koala/shillion/xml-batik/batik-1.1/batik-svgbrowser.jar!/org/apache/batik/apps/svgbrowser/resources/init.svg#innerShadow
creator: hillion@apache.org

text:
We now have a jar Protocol handler that makes sure
that jar urls work.
creator: deweese@apache.org
